>>>DOCUMENT

######################################################################

title:: Block Unit Test Data

id:: td-000072

version:: 2.0

revision:: 4444

date:: 2012-09-11

status:: yellow

define:: version2

######################################################################

* Introduction

id:: introduction

The purpose of this introduction section is to serve as a target for
internal document cross references.

#~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
# glossary entries

glossary:: document {sml} = (SML) A written work about a topic.  SML
document types are: book, report, and article. An SML document is
composed of a document preamble followed by a document narrative

#~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
# acronyms

acronym:: TLA {sml} = Three Letter Acronym

#~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
# notes

note::1: This is a footnote.

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

** Cross Reference 1

id:: cross_reference_1

[ref:introduction]

# LaTeX: Section~\vref{introduction}
# HTML:  <a href="td-000072-1.html#section.1">section 1</a>
# XML:   <a href="td-000072-1.html#section.1">section 1</a>

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

** Cross Reference 2

id:: cross_reference_2

[r:introduction]

# LaTeX: Section~\vref{introduction}
# HTML:  <a href="td-000072-1.html#section.1">section 1</a>
# XML:   <a href="td-000072-1.html#section.1">section 1</a>

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

** URL Reference 1

id:: url_reference_1

[url:http://www.cnn.com/]

# LaTeX: \urlstyle{sf}\url{http://www.cnn.com/}
# HTML:  <a href="http://www.cnn.com/">http://www.cnn.com/</a>
# XML:   <a href="http://www.cnn.com/">http://www.cnn.com/</a>

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

** Footnote Reference 1

id:: footnote_reference_1

[f:introduction:1]

# LaTeX: \footnote{This is a footnote.}
# HTML:  <span style="font-size: 8pt;"><sup><a href="#footnote.introduction.1">1</a></sup></span>
# XML:   <span style="font-size: 8pt;"><sup><a href="#footnote.introduction.1">1</a></sup></span>

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

id:: glossary_reference_1

# XML:   <a href="td-000072.glossary.html#document:sml">document</a>

# XML:   <a href="td-000072-1.html#section.1">link</a>

# XML:   <a href="td-000072-1.html#section.1">link</a>

** File Reference 1

id:: file_reference_1

[file:app.ini]

# LaTeX: \path{app.ini}
# HTML:  <tt>app.ini</tt>
# XML:   <tt>app.ini</tt>

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

** File Reference 2

id:: file_reference_2

[file:My Document.doc]

# LaTeX: \path{My Document.doc}
# HTML:  <tt>My Document.doc</tt>
# XML:   <tt>My Document.doc</tt>

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

** Path Reference 1

id:: path_reference_1

[path:/path/to/folder]

# LaTeX: \path{/path/to/folder}
# HTML:  <tt>/path/to/folder</tt>
# XML:   <tt>/path/to/folder</tt>

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

** Path Reference 2

id:: path_reference_2

[path:/path/to/my folder]

# LaTeX: \path{/path/to/my folder}
# HTML:  <tt>/path/to/my folder</tt>
# XML:   <tt>/path/to/my folder</tt>

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

** Path Reference 3

id:: path_reference_3

[path:C:\path\to\my folder\]

# LaTeX: \path{C:\path\to\my folder}$\backslash$
# HTML:  <tt>C:\path\to\my folder\</tt>
# XML:   <tt>C:\path\to\my folder\</tt>

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

** User Entered Text 1

id:: user_entered_text_1

[enter:USERNAME].

# LaTeX: \textbf{\texttt{USERNAME}}
# HTML:  <b><tt>USERNAME</tt></b>
# XML:   <b><tt>USERNAME</tt></b>

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

** Command Reference 1

id:: command_reference_1

[cmd:pwd]

# LaTeX: \path{pwd}
# HTML:  <tt>pwd</tt>
# XML:   <tt>pwd</tt>

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

** Command Reference 2

id:: command_reference_2

[cmd:ls -al | grep -i bin | sort]

# LaTeX: \path{ls -al | grep -i bin | sort}
# HTML:  <tt>ls -al | grep -i bin | sort</tt>
# XML:   <tt>ls -al | grep -i bin | sort</tt>

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

** Literal XML Tag 1

id:: literal_xml_tag_1

<html>

# LaTeX: <html>
# HTML:  &lt;html&gt;
# XML:   &lt;html&gt;

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

** Literal XML Tag 2

id:: literal_xml_tag_2

<para style="indented">

# LaTeX: <para style="indented">
# HTML:  &lt;para style="indented"&gt;
# XML:   &lt;para style="indented"&gt;

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

** Email Address 1

id:: email_address_1

joe@example.com

# LaTeX: joe\@example.com
# HTML:  <a href="mailto:joe\@example.com">joe\@example.com</a>
# XML:   <a href="mailto:joe\@example.com">joe\@example.com</a>

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

** Take Note Symbol

id:: take_note_symbol

[[take_note]]

# LaTeX: \marginpar{\Huge\Writinghand}
# HTML:  <b>(take note!)</b>
# XML:   <b>(take note!)</b>

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

** Smiley Symbol

id:: smiley_symbol

:-)

# LaTeX: \large\Smiley
# HTML:  (smiley)
# XML:   (smiley)

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

** Frowny Symbol

id:: frowny_symbol

:-(

# LaTeX: \large\Frowny
# HTML:  (frowny)
# XML:   (frowny)

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

** Keystroke Symbol 1

id:: keystroke_symbol_1

[[Enter]]

# LaTeX: \keystroke{Enter}
# HTML:  <span class="keystroke">Enter</span>
# XML:   <span class="keystroke">Enter</span>

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

** Keystroke Symbol 2

id:: keystroke_symbol_2

[[Ctrl]]-[[Alt]]-[[Del]].

# LaTeX: \keystroke{Ctrl}-\keystroke{Alt}-\keystroke{Del}
# HTML:  <span class="keystroke">Ctrl</span>-<span class="keystroke">Alt</span>-<span class="keystroke">Del</span>
# XML:   <span class="keystroke">Ctrl</span>-<span class="keystroke">Alt</span>-<span class="keystroke">Del</span>

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

** Left Arrow Symbol

id:: left_arrow_symbol

<-

# LaTeX: $\leftarrow$
# HTML:  <-
# XML:   <-

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

** Right Arrow Symbol

id:: right_arrow_symbol

->

# LaTeX: $\rightarrow$
# HTML:  ->
# XML:   ->

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

** LaTeX Symbol

id:: latex_symbol

LaTeX

# LaTeX: \LaTeX{}
# HTML:  LaTeX
# XML:   LaTeX

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

** TeX Symbol

id:: tex_symbol

Tex

# LaTeX: \TeX{}
# HTML:  TeX
# XML:   TeX

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

** Copyright Symbol

id:: copyright_symbol

[c]

# LaTeX: \tiny$^{\copyright}$\normalsize
# HTML:  &copy;
# XML:   &copy;

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

** Trademark Symbol

id:: trademark_symbol

[tm]

# LaTeX: \tiny$^{\texttrademark}$\normalsize
# HTML:  <sup><span style="font-size: 8pt;">TM</span></sup>
# XML:   <sup><span style="font-size: 8pt;">TM</span></sup>

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

** Registered Trademark Symbol

id:: reg_trademark_symbol

[r]

# LaTeX: \tiny$^{\textregistered}$\normalsize
# HTML:  <sup><span style="font-size: 8pt;">&reg;</span></sup>
# XML:   <sup><span style="font-size: 8pt;">&reg;</span></sup>

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

** Double Quotes

id:: double_quotes

This is a ``double quoted phrase.''

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

** Single Quotes

id:: single_quotes

This is a `single quoted phrase.'

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

** Section Symbol

id:: section_symbol

[section]

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

** Emdash Symbol

id:: emdash_symbol

Use an emdash -- sparingly -- as a big comma.

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

** Bold

id:: bold

!!bold text!!

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

** Italic

id:: italic

~~italicized text~~

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

** Underline

id:: underline

__underlined text__

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

** Fixed Width

id:: fixedwidth

||fixedwidth text||

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

** Superscript

id:: superscript

^^superscript text^^

#---------------------------------------------------------------------

** Subscript

id:: subscript

,,subscripted text,,

#~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
# sources

---SOURCE

source:: book

title:: The Chicago Manual of Style

label:: cms15

editor:: William S. Strong

editor:: Bryan A. Garner

edition:: 15th Edition

publisher:: The University of Chicago Press

year:: 2003

address:: Chicago 60637

note:: [url:http://www.chicagomanualofstyle.org]

---SOURCE
